prompts: Create a small, rock-type Pokemon with orange claws and a shell-like body.
I want a bug-type creature that has distinctive orange and gray colors, resembling a hermit crab.
Generate a Pokemon with a rugged appearance and vivid orange accents, perfect for a rocky terrain.
Make a creature that embodies the essence of a forest-dwelling critter with a tough exterior.
Imagine a tiny, orange-clawed Pokemon that thrives in caves and mountains, showcasing its unique features.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of both bug and rock types with a fierce personality.
Show me a Pokemon with a distinct shell shape and striking orange features, ready for battle.

distinctive_features: Facial features resembling a hermit crab
